archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection includes a list of birds, "Philpott Reservoir Christmas Bird Count," and a list "Butterflies Observed Along the Little River during Summer 1991."

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Clyde Kessler Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Clyde Kessler Papers, Ms1990-009 - Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Clyde Kessler Papers were donated to Special Collections in 1991.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Clyde Kessler Papers commenced and was completed in 1991. Additional description was completed in June 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection includes a list of birds, "Philpott Reservoir Christmas Bird Count," and a list "Butterflies Observed Along the Little River during Summer 1991." The bird list is dated 1990. The butterfly list is signed by Kessler.
